title: Himi 217
lyrics:
4-6’s&2-8’s
1.
‘Eiki ‘o e ngaahi
Maama ‘i ‘olunga
‘Oku lelei lahi
Kia kimautolu,
‘A e ngaahi nofo’anga
‘O ho’o ‘ofa ‘i māmani.
2.
’Oku fai feinga
‘A hoku loto ni
Ke u mamata atu,
Ki hoku ‘Otua,
‘I ho fale ‘i ‘olunga,
‘E fai pē, ‘o ta’engata.
3.
‘Oku monū’ia,
‘A e kau fai lotu,
‘I he potu tonu
‘O honau ‘Otua
‘A ia na’a ne fili,
Ka tau fa’a hoko ki ai.
4.
‘Oku nau fa’a ‘alu,
‘I honau mālohi,
‘I he luo tangi,
Mo fakapo’uli,
Ke ‘oua ke nau hokosi,
Pea lava ki hēvani.
5.
Ko hotau ‘Otua
Ko e la’ā ia,
Mo e unga’anga,
‘I hotau fononga,
Pea fonu hono nima
‘I he ngaahi me’a’ofa.
6.
Ko ia ‘oku tau
Unuhi mei ai,
‘A e ngaahi me’a
Ke tokoni ‘aki,
Ko e’uhi ke tau lava
Ki hono fonua tapu.
7.
’Oku ‘ofa ma’u pē,
‘E he ‘Eiki lelei,
Ki he kakai tui,
Pea angavaivai;
Pea te ne tuku ki ai,
‘Ene ngaahi tapuaki. *
